Sleep
Sleep while animating
On this page
Sleep while animating
This will sleep while our player is animating (times out after a minute). If 'Stopped for (seconds)' is provided, we'll ensure that you haven't animated for at least that long before firing.
Parameters
â€‹
Stopped for (seconds) (number)
Previous
Sleep until any inner action succeeds
Next
Sleep while moving
Parameters
